014package org.microbean.producer;
015
016/**
017 * A business method-oriented {@link InterceptorMethodType}.
018 *
019 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
020 */
021public abstract non-sealed class AbstractMethodInterceptorMethodType extends InterceptorMethodType {
022
023  /**
024   * Creates a new {@link AbstractMethodInterceptorMethodType}.
025   *
026   * @param name a globally unique name; must not be {@code null}
027   *
028   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null}
029   */
030  protected AbstractMethodInterceptorMethodType(final String name) {
031    super(TargetKind.METHOD, name);
032  }
033  
034}
